message: Comprehensive production simulation framework already exists - extensive benchmark suite with real hardware testing capabilities and performance monitoring

simulation_capabilities.24_7_operation_simulation: Memory patterns, CPU usage, continuous operation testing

simulation_capabilities.real_process_lifecycle_testing: End-to-end cycle testing, error recovery, dual-mode operations
simulation_capabilities.operational_scenario_testing: Concurrent operations, error handling, resource pressure
simulation_capabilities.performance_benchmarking: Database operations, PLC communication, system integration metrics

production_readiness_metrics.real_hardware_integration: PLC manager with real Modbus TCP/IP communication
production_readiness_metrics.continuous_monitoring: Parameter logging every 1 second with dual-mode operation
